title: Simple font, but I can't identify it
content:
Hello,

I would like to ask for help in identifying the type of this font.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016121532im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_6211.jpg)

I know that the quality is not very good, but mayby somebody use it sometimes.

Thanks!  
cde
author: cedunio

comments.content:
Perhaps customized for the Centrum by taking a U and clipping the lh stem?  
Don
Right, /J is different. So should be one of its twin [Engravers Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016121532/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Engravers+gothic).
